name: CI

on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - master  # Se aplică pentru PR-urile pe master

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest  # Folosește Windows

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 22.14.0

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Check Node.js version
        run: node -v

      - name: Build project
        run: npm run build
